posts.post_content: It's like [Blood Tyrant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blood Tyrant) and [Ludevic's Abomination](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ludevic's Abomination) had a child and gave it a lot of steroids. This card is nasty, particularly the art, which looks brutal as hell. Belongs on a metal album, imo. I'm hoping they make this a wallpaper of the week, that'd be sick.

When getting hit with an unblockable 26/26 just isn't enough... When getting hit with an unblockable 39/39 just isn't enough... When getting hit with a 52/52 just - okay, 13 +1/+1 counters? I know it's going for flavor but really?  
  
When only having one opponent losing the game just isn't enough.

Posted By: 001010011100101110 (1/27/2012 7:54:45 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Everything about this guy is so undeniably badass. He can be blocked only by flying black/artifact creatures, and he can't be chumped. The mana cost for the equipment side means nothing in a black-white deck because of [Stoneforge Mystic](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stoneforge Mystic) and [Stonehewer Giant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stonehewer Giant).  
  
But he dies to [Tragic Slip](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tragic Slip).  
  
4.5/5
posts.html:

But he dies to Tragic Slip.

4.5/5

Died immediately to [Crushing Vines](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crushing Vines) the one time I saw him show up at prerelease.  
  
Intimidate THAT.
